[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [ITileDataVisitor](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.md)

## ITileDataVisitor interface

Interface for a client visitor that is used to visit all `THREE.Object`<!-- -->s in a tile.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITileDataVisitor 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [tile](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.tile.md) | [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [visitArea(featureId)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.visitarea.md) | Visit an area object with the specified <code>featureId</code>; use <code>pointAccessor</code> to get the object's properties. |
|  [visitLine(featureId, lineAccessor)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.visitline.md) | Visits a line object with the specified <code>featureId</code>; use <code>pointAccessor</code> to get the object's properties. |
|  [visitObject3D(featureId, object3dAccessor)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.visitobject3d.md) | Visits a 3D object with the specified <code>featureId</code>; use <code>pointAccessor</code> to get the object's properties. |
|  [visitPoint(featureId)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.visitpoint.md) | Visits a point object with the specified <code>featureId</code>; use <code>pointAccessor</code> to get the object's properties. |
|  [wantsArea(featureId)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.wantsarea.md) | Should return <code>true</code> if the visitor wants to visit the area object with the specified <code>featureId</code>. |
|  [wantsFeature(featureId)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.wantsfeature.md) | Should return <code>true</code> if the visitor wants to visit the object with the specified <code>featureId</code>. This function is called before the type of the object is even known. |
|  [wantsLine(featureId)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.wantsline.md) | Should return <code>true</code> if the visitor wants to visit the line with the specified <code>featureId</code>. |
|  [wantsObject3D(featureId)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.wantsobject3d.md) | Should return <code>true</code> if the visitor wants to visit the object with the specified <code>featureId</code>. |
|  [wantsPoint(featureId)](./harp-mapview.itiledatavisitor.wantspoint.md) | Should return <code>true</code> if the visitor wants to visit the point with the specified <code>featureId</code>. |
